head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HIRSH, BARBARA VIGDOR

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HIRSH, BARBARA VIGDOR

block.p: HIRSH--Barbara Vigdor. Beloved wife of the late Walter. Devoted mother of Steven and Alan. Devoted mother-inlaw of Alice. Sister of the late Burt. Loving grandmother to Jonathon, Becki, Jamie, Adam, Samantha, Bret, and Craig. Her love and caring will be missed. Her strength and grace will always be remembered.

HIRSH--Barbara Vigdor. Beloved wife of the late Walter. Devoted mother of Steven and Alan. Devoted mother-inlaw of Alice. Sister of the late Burt. Loving grandmother to Jonathon, Becki, Jamie, Adam, Samantha, Bret, and Craig. Her love and caring will be missed. Her strength and grace will always be remembered.
